Title: Erratum: Author Correction: Preschool children and chimpanzees incur costs to watch punishment of antisocial others (Nature human behaviour (2018) 2 1 (45-51))
Abstract: In the version of this Article originally published, in Fig. 2c the hatching indicating antisocial behaviour was on the wrong data bars. This has now been corrected in the Article.
